description: Try our easy to follow Asparagus With Mustard Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Asparagus With Mustard Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Snap off the tough ends of the asparagus. Peel the lower half of each asparagus with a vegetable peeler. Fill a large frying pan with enough water to come 1 1/2 cm up the sides and bring to a simmer. Add the asparagus. Cover, and cook 3-4 minutes, or until just tender. Drain and rinse under cold running water. Pat dry with paper towels. Refrigerate while making the sauce.
For the sauce, whisk the oil, vinegar, mustard, and tarragon together in a bowl. Whisk in the yoghurt until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.
Divide the asparagus among salad plates. Top with the mustard sauce and sprinkle with the red onion. Serve immediately.
